features.Keen Smell: The bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.Multiattack: The bear makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

features.Hold Breath: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.
features.Underwater Camouflage: The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.
features.Water Breathing: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

tentacles.special: On hit the target is grappled (escape DC 10). Until this grapple ends, the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

ink cloud.effect: A 5-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.
